headline: How Softer US-China Trade Policies Could Reshape Best Buy’s (BBY) Supply Chain and Cost Structure
summary: In the past week, Best Buy saw a shift in market sentiment after the U.S. administration adopted a softer stance on trade with China, alleviating tariff concerns for electronics retailers. This change comes just as Best Buy completed its "Techtober Sale" and revised its full-year guidance, placing the company's sourcing strategies and cost management in the spotlight. A unique aspect highlighted by CEO Corie Barry was the company's focus on adapting to growing economic disparities among...
